title: Trying to backup my old Pixel 2XL phone, but the Back Up Now button is greyed out. Any idea why?
content:
I ordered a replacement device from Google for my Google Pixel 2XL device because my old device shuts down every time I plug it into charging.

I can't use the cable for a device-to-device copy data for restore because my old phone shuts down when I plug it in, so I need to reply on cloud backup.

Now when I'm trying to backup my old device and restore into new device, I can't seem to do if because Settings > Google > Backup shows a grayed out Back Up Now button. I can't create a backup.

I could start creating a backup about an hour ago, but it always errored "Can't create backup, please try again later". Now, the button got grayed out so I can't even start. Google customer service told me to turn to forums because they can't help, so I'm posting my issue here.

Anyone faced this issue before?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
